Kim Taesung

Korean: 김태성

Country:

South Korea

Full name:
Kim Tae-seong
Native name:
김태성
Birthday:
Dec 31, 2003
Age:
21 years old
Group (2019-present):
K-TIGERS ZERO

Introduction

Kim Taesung is a South Korean singer and taekwondo practitioner under K-Tigers E&C. He is a member of the co-ed group K-TIGERS ZERO.

On May 20, 2021, Kim Taesung was revealed as a contestant on SBS's survival show LOUD but was sadly eliminated in the first round.

He joined the co-ed group K-TIGERS ZERO as a new member on December 11, 2021.

On September 26, 2024, he was revealed as a contestant on JTBC's survival show PROJECT7 starting in October 2024. He was eliminated from the show in episode 5 after ranking 78th place.
